data.system_settings: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, Asus Netbook F551C, Intel Core i3 64bits
data.actual_result: Text shows italics in expanded topic but not in header. Happens with bold as well.
data.expected_result: Italics should render in both header and expanded version
data.short_description: Bold and italics in channel topic won't render in channel header, but render fine once you expand the channel topic
data.steps_to_repro: - Edit a channel and set a channel topic as one word wrapped between single asterisks - Observe the channel topic in the header. No italics - Now clickto expand the channel topic. Italics work there
